LanguageData.ShortCircuitPartial: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} W of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but {2} of it was mitigated by the fuses.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitProtected: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} W of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged, but any serious damage was prevented by the fuses.
